original: intros p k a b n r Hprime Hrelprime Hr Hrn Hrelprimestr. intros H. apply (not_iff_compat (power p r * k * power b n <> power a n) (power p r * power b n * k <> power a n)). split; intro Hnot. - intro Hcontra. apply Hnot. rewrite (Nat.mul_comm (power p r) k). rewrite (Nat.mul_assoc (power p r) k (power b n)). rewrite (Nat.mul_comm k (power b n)). apply Hcontra. - intro Hcontra. apply Hnot. rewrite (Nat.mul_comm (power p r) (power b n)). rewrite (Nat.mul_assoc (power p r) (power b n) k). rewrite (Nat.mul_comm (power p r * power b n) k). apply Hcontra. apply H.
